data.title: Domus Selecta Residencia Real Castillo de Curiel - TiCATi.com
data.meta_description: Experience Domus Selecta Residencia Real Castillo de Curiel. Book now & save up to 50% with TiCATi! Share your stay to save more. Your green hotel choice in CURIEL DE DUERO.
data.text: The Castle of Curiel de Duero is the most ancient fortress in the province of Valladolid for it was built in the Roman date (a coin of Emperor Arcadius, from the fourth century AD, was found on site during the reconstruction works). The surrounding walls were probably, from the seventh century AD. Our delicate and exquisite service will make your stay unforgettable: welcome cocktail, daily press in your room, generous breakfast buffet, 24 hour room service, bicycles, visits to wineries and excursions to the Duero's valley, wine tasting, archery, astronomical observations, outdoor swimming pool and showers, solarium, jacuzzi, television and direct dial telephone in every room, electronic safe, hair dryer, automatized lavatories, amenities, remote-controlled personal air conditioning etc. All these services and activities are included in your room's rate. Car parking and luggage service: you can leave your vehicule right at the main entrance of the hotel. We can also arrange for you falconry exhibitions, horse riding and minibus excursions to nearby monuments and castles.
